definition: back of neck/item/thing/term (in a mathematical formula)/sum (of money)/classifier for principles, items, clauses, tasks, research projects etc

sentences.english: People put great effort into their products and exhibits in the hope of winning an award.
sentences.chinese: 人們在參展品上花很多工夫，希望贏得獎項。

sentences.english: EXAMPLE: The popular comedy is the odds-on favorite to win the top film award this year.
sentences.chinese: 這部流行喜劇是贏取本年電影最高獎項的大熱門。

sentences.english: Non-participation at the rehearsals and the gala concert results in loss of the prize.
sentences.chinese: 不參加彩排和慶典音樂會的選手將失去獎項。

sentences.english: He has been awarded for several times the MEXT prize of Japan.
sentences.chinese: 他曾經多次獲得日本文部科學大臣獎等諸多藝術獎項。

sentences.english: There are five nominees in most Oscar categories.
sentences.chinese: 奧斯卡的大多數獎項都有五位被提名者。

sentences.english: Save yourself the trouble and just give the Dark Knight all the awards.
sentences.chinese: 給自己省點麻煩，把所有獎項都給TDK就完了。

sentences.english: Assuming, of course, that Roth doesn’t win the prize while hecan still enjoy it.
sentences.chinese: 當然，那要假定羅斯未拿到獎品但仍可享有獎項。

sentences.english: The granddaddy of all awards has the tightest race.
sentences.chinese: 這是所有獎項中競爭最激烈的一個。

sentences.english: Dr. Myles Brand, the president of the NCAA, accepted the award on its behalf.
sentences.chinese: 邁爾斯博士品牌，在NCAA總統，代其接受了獎項。

sentences.english: Dynamic Submission is multi-award winning, web promotion software on the market today.
sentences.chinese: 動態提交是今日市場上多獎項的網站推廣軟件。

sentences.english: Trophies for top 3 teams in each category of the Eco Adventure category.
sentences.chinese: 參賽號碼亦會用作最佳環保衣著獎等其他獎項所用。

sentences.english: MEC was the winner of not-for-profit sector category.
sentences.chinese: MEC是管理獎項中的非營利機構獎的贏家。

sentences.english: He has since been the recipient of several prestigious awards from Korea and Japan.
sentences.chinese: 此後他又獲得韓國和日本的多項著名的獎項。

sentences.english: His solo albums sold millions of copies and won numerous awards in the UK and in the US.
sentences.chinese: 他的個人專輯銷量百萬，曾在英美兩國獲過多枚獎項。

sentences.english: Scientific is one of only 11 companies nationwide to receive the award this year.
sentences.chinese: 格柏是今年獲授此獎項的僅有11家企業之一。

sentences.english: It is the highest award a producer can receive.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個製作人所能獲得的最高獎項。

definition: special glory/distinction/rare honor/one's laurels/it's a privilege (to meet you)
to get past the qualifying round/to make it to the finals
to select on the basis of a vote or consensus
